author: ghudson
msg: (escape_string): D'oh, got careless.  Clean up a bit.

author: ghudson
msg: The Berkeley DB stuff was done a while ago by jimb.
libsvn_wc now uses the delta code courtesy of sussman and myself.

author: ghudson
msg: (do_apply_textdelta): According to the comment in svn_delta.h about
svn_txdelta_window_handler_t, we have to call window_handler with a
NULL window argument after we're out of windows.

author: ghudson
msg: svn_txdelta_apply_window, so we can handle arbitrary text deltas now.
(handler_baton): New type of handler to encapsulate applicator state.
This change compiles cleanly and is fairly simple, but there is too
much churn in this library right now to test it.
